text: At this discussion, special attention was paid about the mineral resources in Sri Lanka by both parties.Visiting Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe held discussions with the Australian Minister for Industry, Innovation and Science Arthur Sinodinos yesterday (15th Feb.) at the Parliament premises in Canberra. At this discussion, special attention was paid about the mineral resources in Sri Lanka by both parties.
title: PM meets Australian minister for Industry, Innovation and Science
